Package API

Class DataController

java.lang.Object
API.DataController
@RestController
@EnableScheduling
public class DataController
extends Object
DataController is the class we use to scrape the needed data, create the objects and routes of the API
Author:
Simon, Sarunas

  • Constructor Details

    • DataController

      public DataController()

  • Method Details

    • updateTeamsData

      @Scheduled(fixedDelay=21600000L) public void updateTeamsData()
      Scheduled task which calls a method every 6 hours. That method calls Teams class' update method which scrapes the basketball data thus updating it

    • testNull

      @GetMapping("/testNull") public Map<String,​ArrayList<Team>> testNull()
      Test route to test if the routes return an appropriate HTTP error header if there is no data to return
      Returns:
      Map<String, ArrayList<Team>> a null object

    • teams

      @GetMapping("/teams") public Map<String,​ArrayList<Team>> teams()
      Returns all teams in the league with all of their data
      Returns:
      Map<String, ArrayList<Team>> map that has a conference name as a key and the list of it's teams as a value

    • team

      @GetMapping("/teams/{confName}") public ArrayList<Team> team​(@PathVariable String confName)
      Displays the data of all the teams in the specified conference
      Parameters:
      confName - The name of the requested conference
      Returns:
      ArrayList<Team> - a list of all the teams in the conference
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - If the list of teams is not yet loaded or the entered conference name doesn't exist

    • player

      @GetMapping("/teams/{confName}/{team}") public Team player​(@PathVariable String confName, @PathVariable String team)
      Displays the data of the specified team in a specified conference
      Parameters:
      confName - the name of the requested conference
      team - - the name of the requested team
      Returns:
      Team - the requested team
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - If the list of teams is not yet loaded or the entered conference name doesn't exist

    • allTeams

      public ArrayList<Team> allTeams()
      Creates one list of both conferences' teams
      Returns:
      ArrayList<Team> - a list of all the teams

    • wins

      @GetMapping("/teams/wins") public List<Team> wins()
      Displays the teams sorted by the amount of won games
      Returns:
      List<Team> - a list teams sorted by the amount of won games

    • losses

      @GetMapping("/teams/losses") public List<Team> losses()
